sentences.sentence: The foreman was asked by the clerk whether the jurors had reached verdicts on which they all agreed.
sentences.translation: 书记员问陪审团主席是不是陪审员们已作出了全体一致的裁决。

sentences.sentence: Verdicts should represent the conscience of the community and not just the letter of the law.
sentences.translation: 裁决应该代表社会的良知，而不仅仅是法律条文。

sentences.sentence: It upheld verdicts in lower courts and ruled that in view of the complex scientific issues involved.
sentences.translation: 鉴于所涉及的复杂科学问题，法院维持了下级法院的判决。
